Title: Brand Upon the Brain!
Writer: Guy Maddin, Louis Negin (narration), George Toles
Actors: Gretchen Krich, Sullivan Brown, Maya Lawson, Katherine E. Scharhon
Plot: Returned home to his long-estranged mother upon a request from her deathbed, a man raised by his parents in an orphanage has to confront the childhood memories that have long haunted him.
